name: Centratore
description:
FLAVOR:

  • Monk-type

  • Internal "balance" moves, certain positions allow magic or improved martial effects

  • Street fighter special moves energy

WEAPONS:

  • Light, common, no ranged except thrown?

ENGAGEMENT:

  • Dependent on stance?

ABILITIES:

  • Different stance grids (animals: dragon, scorpion, etc.), with themed attack bonuses for each

  • Four elements magic

  • Breath move each turn

  • Movement & actions influences stance position

OLD NOTES:

  • Monk-like class based on Balance game: in addition to your physical position on the battlefield, you also track your position on a grid (forward/back, yin/yang) that represents the orientation of your energy as you move in battle.

  • You start in the center. Actions you take move you on the grid in addition to their normal effects. Like a Scrabble board, there are squares that offer different bonuses, so you’re trying to find the right combination of moves that will get you to a certain point on the grid.

  • If you get knocked off the grid, there’s some minor penalty and you reset back to center.

  • Should have “breath” moves that are either a bonus action or something you get to do every turn in addition to normal stuff.

  • Start with basic ~5x5 grid, advancements get you bigger or differently-shaped grids. Each grid is a different “stance.” Maybe some of the grids are super difficult to stay on but offer mega bonuses.
